title: Bandish Bandits
overview: A classical singer Radhe falls in love with pop singer Tamanna and embarks on a path that forces him to compromise his classical roots. With time, both the singers try to get out of their comfort zone while  trying to protect their stardom. This series tests their resolve for their passion and love.

tv.episodeOverview: Radhe’s band picks Royalty free for versus round, and Tamanna’s band chooses a challenging song. The Rathods struggle with pop music, but they adapt a Panditji composition to fit the song’s raga. On stage, Tamanna excels initially but falters with high notes, allowing Radhe to win. Tamanna left the competition. The Rathods are devastated when Digvijay copyrights Panditji’s composition.
